div.p: WAY Michigan is an online charter school serving grades 6 - 12 across the state of Michigan.
1. Engaging Projects - Students explore authentic, engaging, and real-world problems
2. Progress Faster - Students progress by mastering learning standards in their courses
3. Technology Provided - Free laptop & internet are provided, if needed
4. Accredited - WAY Michigan is nationally accredited by AdvancEd
5. Make Your Schedule - Student create their own weekly schedule

img.alt: Re-Enrollment Forms Due for 2020-21 School Year

div.a: Re-Enrollment Forms Due for 2020-21 School Year

p.font: WAY Michigan families we need you to submit your re-enrollment forms to guarantee your spot for the 2020-21 school year. With the COVID-19 crisis we have had increased interest in enrollment. We want to ensure our families currently enrolled have a chance to keep their spots. We need the re-enrollment forms completed by May 1st. Any forms completed after this time will be considered late. If there is anything we can do to assist you please call the office at 313-638-2716 or email us at enroll@wayprogram.net.

div.a: Michigan is Providing Food to Families Affected by School Closings Caused by COVID-19

div.p: Michigan has become the first state in the country to gain federal approval of a program that will provide nutritious food to children who were affected by school closings due to COVID-19. The full information can be found inside.

div.p: We have published our April newsletter!
If there is any feedback you would like to give or topics you would like in future newsletters please feel free to reach out to us at 313-638-2716 or email us at enroll@wayprogram.net.

div.a: E-learning Takes Center Stage: Governors, State and Local Superintendents Should Take Advantage

div.p: Education Views recently caught up with Beth Baker, Co-founder and Executive Director along with her co-partner Glen Taylor, both from Michigan who have been engaged with cutting edge educational models for over a decade creating WAY Online, WAY Academy, and WAY American Schools. WAY partners with local schools, parents and teachers and offer a robust, internationally accredited, project-based curriculum on their innovative cloud-based platform.

img.alt: COVID-19 Crisis and Director Video Announcements

div.a: COVID-19 Crisis and Director Video Announcements

p.font: We hope all families and community members continue to stay safe as we go through the COVID-19 (Coronavirus Crisis). WAY Michigan staff will be working remotely until our office opens on Monday April 6th. During this time we have our office phone forwarded to staff at home and staff monitoring our enroll@wayprogram.net email. During this time our Director has decided to record video announcements. He will be doing several a week to update the school and community on any updates we have about the COVID-19 crisis and its relation to our school operation.
